reqs:
Co-reqs: NURS 511.
******* IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (student.services@nursing.ubc.ca) *******
Qualitative Research Methods - This course is designed as an introductory graduate level course for those considering qualitative methods for thesis or dissertation projects or interested in learning about how qualitative methods might be integrated into future mixed methods initiatives. The structure of the course allows for interactive dialogue around foundations of qualitative inquiry, methodological applications from various qualitative research traditions, as well as techniques and tools to strengthen qualitative data collection and analysis.
Waitlist Section for NURS 548-001
